questions.quote: ...Well, obviously... You know...  Ap..ap, Chu... Why would you think I was having an affair with George?
Anyone can get into podiatry school. George got into podiatry school.
Ohh yeah. A wise man once taught me the Healing power of the body's natural pressure points.
No, and I prefer "Conrad". So I heard what happened to the desk.
Oh, I need some water. Ice it up nice and hard ... and when you throw it - Pop! Oh look,  there's my friend, FDR. I'm gonna nail him in the back of the head. It's gonna be great!
All right lets go. We'll meet you back down here in ten minutes, hopefully with the money.
But it--eh.. It was here, I'm tellin' you, an' w--w--it was really here! The, there was, a, bar, and a, an' a dance floor..
Well, I think he could've asked me. Supposed to be a friend of mine.
Well, you know, I shouldn't have let you into Kramer's, now you want to go into Elaine's...she entrusted me with her spare keys, how can I just let you in?
- Nnnhhahahahahahahahahahahahahaha . Oh, you know what? I think Naked Gun is on. Oh I've seen it. I laughed through that whole thing. You wanna watch?
